body:
Fix the build for normal non-root/non-system-user builds:

Add variant `'system_install'` (like `libfuse`) to not attempt install
int the system by default. On `~system_install`, use `DESTDIR=prefix`

Also add `pkgconfig` and remove not explicitly needed `depends_on('m4')`
title: cgdcbxd(net_prio cgroup daemon): Add variant '+system_install'
